title: ABA Therapy
shortDescription: Evidence-based therapy using behavioral principles to teach skills and reduce challenging behaviors.
description: Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) is the most widely researched and evidence-based treatment for autism spectrum disorder. ABA therapy uses principles of learning and behavior to increase helpful behaviors and decrease harmful ones. Therapists work one-on-one with children to teach communication, social skills, self-care, and academic skills while reducing problematic behaviors. Treatment is individualized based on comprehensive assessments and data-driven decision making.
benefits: Evidence-based with decades of research support
Individualized treatment plans based on assessment
Develops self-care and daily living skills
whoCanBenefit: Children with autism spectrum disorder diagnosis
Older children and teens needing continued support
